contentrichtext.text: The '''[[Río de la Plata]]''' (River Plate) is a river estuary in Argentina and Uruguay. '''Río de la Plata''' may also refer to: *[[Río de la Plata Basin]], the hydrographical area that covers parts of Argentina, Brazil, Bolivia, Paraguay and Uruguay *[[Río de la Plata craton]], one of the five cratons (ancient nuclei) of the South American continent *[[Viceroyalty of the Río de la Plata]], an administrative district within the Spanish empire *[[Governorate of the Río de la Plata]], an administrative district preceding the viceroyalty *[[Río de la Plata Bank]], a building in Madrid by Antonio Palacios *[[Rio de la Plata (Puerto Rico)]], a river in Puerto Rico {{disambig|geo}}
